errors.server: A server error occurred. Please try again.
errors.analyze_sample: An error occurred while analyzing your sample file. Check the separator and make sure your file has at least a header row.

gap_filling_strategy.headline: Handle missing values in intervals
gap_filling_strategy.option_empty: Leave empty - shown in queue as "no data"
gap_filling_strategy.option_zero: Fill with zero - shown in queue as "0"
gap_filling_strategy.explanation: Depending on your selection the missing value will be filled with zero (0) or be left empty. In case there is already existing data for this interval it will be either replaced with zero (0) or removed.

name.headline: Name the CSV schema.
name.unique: The name needs to be unique.

sample_file.description: The sample file should look like a typical CSV you use for importing your data. You will work with it in the next step when mapping your data to the injixo requirements.
sample_file.headline: CSV sample file
sample_file.explanation: Upload a CSV file (.csv or .txt) you use for importing your data. You will map this CSV data in the next step.

timezone.headline: Time zone
timezone.placeholder: Search or select a time zone
timezone.tooltip: You can search by city or by offset (UTC+/-hh:mm).

layout.explanation: injixo will aggregate individual contacts into intervals of 15 minutes.
layout.headline: Layout of data

preprocessing.edit_disabled: To modify your preprocessing options, you need to re-upload the CSV file.

empty_lines.explanation: Skip rows that only have separators and no values.
empty_lines.label: Skip empty rows

headerless.explanation: Header columns will be labelled with A, B, C etc.
headerless.label: Add header row

skip_lines_containing.explanation: Skip rows with values that match at least one of the added strings.
skip_lines_containing.label: Skip row(s) containing:

skip_starting_lines.explanation: Skip the specified number of rows, starting from the top.
skip_starting_lines.label: Skip first <input /> row(s)

preprocessing.title: Preprocessing options

modal.content: You are about to save the CSV schema with a different mapping method.
modal.title: Change CSV mapping method?

warning.overwriting: Your current CSV schema will be overwritten.
warning.restoring: You cannot restore the previous CSV schema.

toggle.label: Use SQL query to map columns
toggle.tooltip: Use this option if your ACD does not output CSV files that contain the column names below.

result.hint: Please check in the preview that columns of the same data type have not been swapped (e.g. Offered and Handled). Learn more in <explanationTarget>Help Center</explanationTarget>.
result.title: Test result

test.unknown_error: The mapping could not be tested.

reupload_required_info.label: To change the column separator or preprocessing options, upload the CSV file again.

errors.end_time_before_start_time: End time must not be before start time.
errors.excessive_data: More than one year of data is not supported.
errors.file_too_large: The file you tried to upload is too large. The maximum size is 7MB.
errors.invalid_duration_cdr: The contact was claimed to be handled but has no duration.
errors.invalid_end_of_line: Use consistent end of line characters in one file.
errors.invalid_handled_cdr: The handled field must contain either 0 or 1.
errors.invalid_number: Check the formats of the numeric values.
errors.invalid_row_length: The number of fields in this line doesn't match the number of fields in the header row.
errors.invalid_timestamp: Invalid timestamp according to the interval length.
errors.non_existing_timestamp: The specified local time does not represent an existing timestamp.
errors.invalid_time_range: The data exceeds the maximum period of 10 years.
